enspire. interactivity. InteractivityManager

enspire.display.BaseDisplayManager
enspire.interactivity.InteractivityManager

a singleton class used to register and initilize activities in an ILE application

createInteractivity(sType: String, nDelay: Number)

called on after start segment

Parrameters

sType(required) string label for interactivity taken from arg sType
nDelay(optional) delay in seconds

public function swapDepths(mc: MovieClip,
nDepth: Number) : Void

swap depths on a clip and make sure it is marked for destruction by GarbageCollection

Parrameters

nDepth(required) number of new depth

Any display manager class should extend this class
